description: Save time by using a hot roast chicken for this easy dinner. Simply add juicy corn cobs, a coleslaw salad and delicious gravy. Ready in just 15 minutes.
keywords: Roast chicken,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Super Simple Roast Chicken & Slaw Dinner Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg frozen Birds Eye Australian corn cobs

recipeInstructions.text: Place corn cobs in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 4 minutes or until hot. Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook corn, turning occasionally, for 2 minutes or until beginning to char.
Place gravy powder in a heatproof jug. Add 1 cup boiling water and stir until mixture is well combined and slightly thickened.
Break chicken into portions and place on serving plates with stuffing.
Add coleslaw and corn to plates. Drizzle chicken with gravy and serve immediately.
